ResourceHeader.ResourceName: The BAS A80 Search Coil Instrument.
ResourceHeader.Description:
The Search Coil instrument recording geomagnetic micropulsation data at
   frequencies less than about 10 Hz at the BAS A80 geomagnetic observatory
   at about 80.8 GLat, 339.6 East Glong.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Mark J. Engebretson, Augsburg College (2211 Riverside Avenue, Minneapolis, MN 55454-1338, USA) for use of data from the BAS A80 SearchCoil instrument.
